entry.title: Home is where trouble goes
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,475Chapters: 12/30Kudos: 1,151

Summary: Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski left Beacon hills and never looked back. Nine years ago, Stiles Stilinski joined a new pack under the tutelage of a fellow spark. Five years ago, he survived the massacre of his pack by simple chance, leaving him with the children of his alpha in his custody.Nine years ago, Stiles vowed to never return to Beacon Hills. What happens when he finds out his children have decided to go sneaking their way to the hell mouth to know his past?(Or the Beacon Hills pack meet a pair of strange twins who claim to be investigating their own father.)

entry.title: Book 1: The Triskele / Book 2: The Mischief / Book 3(A/B): The Triskele and the Mischief
entry.summary:
Author: Solinvictus22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,756Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 27

Summary: (FIXED AND EDITED; UNTIL CHAPTER 30)Trilogy wrapped into one:Book 1: Nemes(plural, pronounced nim/s) are people naturally born with connection to the primordial energies of the Earth enabling them to cast magic, Stiles is born a Neme and so is the prince he guards, while they have the war on their heads, against Neme-hunters of Edenia, humans who unlocked the science that may end the age of magic users.Book 2: Stiles' life turned upside down after engaging himself with dark magic, unknowingly the consequence of his actions weights more dreadful than just losing his light magic: the birth of the MischiefBook 3A: With the royalties and soldier mages reunited, they must finally face their greatest common enemy, Deucalion and his cult.Book 3B: Argesh has distracted itself by its inner conflict, Edenia has hibernated long enough to reinforce their anti magic tech to swoop the magical kingdoms with its storm.

entry.title: Bad Reputation
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,017Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 36

Summary: This was it. This was the day he got fired. They were going to escort him out of the building in front of everyone, like in those movies. He was going to have to pack up his desk, and he would walk out, head hung low, his life in shambles. He’d be the laughingstock of the entire company. Everyone was going to get a good look at the person who thought it was a good idea to send a shirtless selfie to his boss.As he approached the door, Stiles hesitated for a moment, imagining a dramatic exit—throwing his coffee cup on the floor in frustration, dramatically ripping his tie off like he was in an action sequence, and walking out in slow motion to some hauntingly emotional soundtrack. But no. There was no soundtrack. There was no exit strategy. And Stiles, well, he was about to have the most awkward conversation of his entire life.He knocked.

entry.title: Blood and Ashes
entry.summary:
Author: lavieboheme0919

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,496Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 21

Summary: Several centuries after the Last Battle, the White Tower stands taller than ever—rebuilt, restructured, and reeling from new threats that no one dares name aloud. Saidin has returned, cleansed and chaotic, and the Hall of the Tower seeks control more than balance. When Stiles—a powerful male channeler raised to Aes Sedai—survives a narrow vote in the Hall for flouting Tower law and custom, he’s spared gentling… but not punishment.Bound without consent to Sitters from opposing Ajahs, declared the first Striker since the Age of Legends, Stiles finds himself weaponized by a Tower that fears what it cannot command. But Stiles is not their dog to tame, and the Tower is not as united as it pretends to be. As ancient tensions simmer and forgotten enemies stir, bonds—both sacred and profane—will be tested.This is not the story of the Dragon. This is what comes after.Power without trust. Bonds without love. And one man who will burn down the Pattern before letting them leash him again.Note: There will be some AI-generated art for an important moment from each chapter at the end of each chapter.

entry.title: my blood never tasted like wine
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene (Aconitehart)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,750Chapters: 4/10Kudos: 255

Summary: Peter looks up and frowns. "I'm busy, nephew."Shit. Stiles peeks over his shoulder and, sure enough, there's Derek Hale. Dark hair, pale eyes, stubble carefully sculpted and contoured. He looks older now, more solid, with a hint of grey at his temples.  He's wearing a suit, like every other mobster werewolf in existence. Stiles stares, open-mouthed, for a moment before he realises that Derek is glaring at him. Mortified, he turns away, his heart banging against his rib cage."Ah, that's right," Peter says, lazily waving a hand. "You two are already acquainted."That's not really how Stiles would put it, but he keeps his mouth shut. He stares down at his hands, feeling Derek's gaze boring holes through him."The Stilinski kid is here looking for work?" Derek asks, sounding almost disgusted. "He's going to be dancing here?""I feel like a broken record," Stiles snaps, twisting around to look at Derek again. "For the last time, all of my clothes are staying on. I'm not going to writhe around a stripper pole to entertain a bunch of wolves. But I can mix drinks and serve cocktails, okay? That's what I want to do."

entry.title: The Truth Will Set You Free
entry.summary:
Author: AShortWalkToDelinquency

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,568Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 78

Summary: Half of Stiles' business is selling tarot decks, incense, crystals, and candles to a mixture of people who range from truly spiritual to just plain curious, and the solstice really makes no difference there. The other half of his business, though, deals with a different kind of magic and all things supernatural. For that side, the solstice changes everything.Because four times a year — the summer and winter solstices and the spring and autumnal equinoxes — magic is a little louder, a little closer to the surface.And a whole lot more wild.OrWhen a thank you gift from one of Stiles' clients unexpectedly traps Derek and Stiles, they quickly discover that it might just be their secrets that have been holding them back all these years.

entry.title: Maybe this time we'll get it right
entry.summary:

entry.title: Fighting for Hope
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,002Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 39

Summary: Stiles Stilinski, a bright young police man in training, travels to Europe with his Dad.There he suffers a terrible tragedy: Getting deported into sexual slavery.Being sold as an "American Virgin Boy Nr. 14", it appears to be his fate to provide sexual services to any customer.But one strange customer might just be his chance for freedom. Derek Hale comes from a wealthy family, defies the criminal system he was born into and tries to rescue two little girls from being trafficked.After spending years in a private prison, he finally breaks free and resumes his life's work. And he is out to take revenge.What he did not anticipate was falling in love with a guy named Stiles. How will they escape the grasp of an internationally operating slavery syndicate?How will Stiles find trust again? Love and hope despite everything?

Author: Violin715

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,219Chapters: 13/25Kudos: 323

Summary: Stiles absolutely, most definitely, totally does NOT have a crush on Derek Hale. Not at all. He doesn't.He grew up with the Hale kids and saw every embarrassing moment along the way. How could he have a crush on someone he saw cry the first time they saw their beta shift in the mirror? Someone he saw literally almost bite off their own finger while eating.
